title: Beacon Roofing, Sunrun, Marchex and Other 13D Filings
text:
13Ds are filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission within 10 days of an entity’s attaining a greater than 5% position in any class of a company’s securities. Subsequent changes in holdings or intentions must be reported in amended filings. This material has been extracted from filings released by the SEC from Sept. 19 through Sept. 25, 2019. Source: InsiderScore.com

Activist Holdings
